issue_place_s: Charleston, South Carolina, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Ship. THE ACTAEON. IRAM PRUDENTIA VINCIT (The Actaeon, Wisdom overcomes age).
issue_obverse_legend_s: IV DOLLARS. | SOUTH-CAROLINA. | THIS BILL intitles the Bearer to receive Four Spanish milled Dollars, or the Value thereof in Gold or Silver, according to an Act of the General Assembly passed, at CHARLES-TOWN, the 23d Day of December, 1776.
issue_reverse_legend_s: IV Dollars. DEATH to COUNTERFEIT. | L. 6: 10: 0 | CHARLES-TOWN: PRINTED BY P. Timothy, 1777 | DEATH to COUNTERFEIT.
